main: ^And now we must test our flirting skills, of course!
^How do you wish to attempt to flirt?
mainThreatenGoodTimeResponse: ^Heph raises their sword up to the chin of testEnemyOne
^Forcing a slight raise of the head, and a meeting of eyelines
mainSmoothlySuggestiveResponse: ^Heph very awkwardly suggests that testEnemyOne should meet with them for coffee
mainUncomfortableCloseness: ^Oops, didnt really mean to do that.
mainAccidentallyFlop: ^In fact, you begin to doubt it is even physically possible for you to feel the things you are currently feeling in regards to testEnemyOne
EndOfCombat: ^The combat ends, and both fighters leave towards their exits

c-0: ^You follow testEnemyOne to their exit, how they respond, you will never know
c-1: ^You go to your own exit, clearly leaving no option for further talking
